metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7313 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
www/resource.py in Buildbot before 1.8.1 allows CRLF injection in the Location header of /auth/login and /auth/logout via the redirect parameter. This affects other web sites in the same domain.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

buildbot - 2.0.0-1
buildbot-slave - 2.0.0-1
buildbot-worker - 2.0.0-1
python3-buildbot - 2.0.0-1
python3-buildbot-worker - 2.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: buildbot package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0.0-1').
